name: Random/Multiple Cylinder Misfire Detected
description: The PCM has detected multiple misfires across various cylinders.
possible_causes: Worn spark plugs or ignition components
Low fuel pressure or injector issues
troubleshooting_steps: Pull freeze-frame data and note engine conditions
Inspect and replace spark plugs as needed
Check ignition coils and wires for damage
Perform a smoke test for vacuum leaks
Measure fuel pressure and injector balance
Verify crank/cam sensor operation with scan tool

name: Catalyst System Efficiency Below Threshold (Bank 1)
description: Catalytic converter efficiency is below calibrated threshold.
possible_causes: Exhaust leaks upstream of the converter
troubleshooting_steps: Verify O2 sensor switching and bias
Check for stored misfire codes and address
